title: OpenAI O3 breakthrough high score on ARC-AGI-PUB
dot: digraph ARC_Prize{rankdir=LR;node[shape=box, style=rounded, fontname="Helvetica", fontsize=10];ARC_Prize[label="ARC Prize" shape=ellipse width=1.2 height=1.2]O3[label="OpenAI o3 System" shape=ellipse width=1.2 height=1.2]AGI_Benchmark[label="ARC-AGI Benchmark" shape=ellipse width=1.2 height=1.2]Breakthrough[label="Breakthrough: 75.7% Score" shape=ellipse width=1.4 height=1.4 style=dotted]Ideas_Needed[label="New Ideas Needed for Progress" shape=ellipse width=1.4 height=1.4 style=dotted]ARC_Prize->O3[label="Goals: AGI Research & Benchmark"]O3->AGI_Benchmark[label="Evaluated on ARC-AGI Datasets"]AGI_Benchmark->Breakthrough[label="Achieved 75.7% in Semi-Private Evaluation"]Breakthrough->Ideas_Needed[label="O3 Represents a Leap in AI Adaptation"]O3->Ideas_Needed[label="Architecture + Program Synthesis Overcome LLM Limitations"] eval_results[label="Evaluation Results" shape=box, style=dashed]eval_results->Semi_Private[label="Semi-Private Eval: 75.7% (6 compute)"]eval_results->Low_Compute[label="Low-Compute: 87.5% (1024 compute)"]AGI_Benchmark->ARC_AGI_2[label="ARC-AGI-2 Coming in 2025"]ARC_AGI_2[label="ARC-AGI-2: More Challenging, Redefining State-of-the-Art"]ARC_Prize->AGI_Benchmark[label="Future Benchmarks to Push Boundaries"]Ideas_Needed->o3_limitations[label="o3 Not Yet AGI, Needs Further Testing"]subgraph cluster_0{label="OpenAI o3 Testing Results";Semi_Private[label="Semi-Private Eval (100 tasks)", shape=plaintext width=0.2]Low_Compute[label="Low Compute: 87.5%", shape=plaintext width=0.2]} subgraph cluster_1{label="Analysis & Community Involvement";o3_limitations[label="Analyze ~9% Unsolved Tasks", shape=plaintext width=0.3]}}

title: Why are UK electricity bills so expensive?
dot:
digraph ElectricityBillBreakdown{graph[rankdir=LR, fontname="Helvetica", fontsize=12, pad=1];node[shape=box, style="filled", fontname="Helvetica", fontsize=12, width=3.5];main[label="UK Electricity Bill Breakdown
(Interactive Website)", shape=ellipse, style=filled, fillcolor=lightblue];wholesale_cost[label="Wholesale Power Cost (1/3 of Bill)", shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightgreen];network_cost[label="Network Costs
(2/3 of Bill)", shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightyellow];generation_cost[label="Generation Costs
(Offshore Wind, Solar, Gas)", shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightyellow];miscellaneous_cost[label="Miscellaneous Costs
(Taxes, Utility Running Costs)", shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightyellow];rising_network_cost[label="Rising Network Costs
(Urgent Grid Expansion)", shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightcoral];cfd_cost[label="Contracts for Difference
(Renewable Subsidy)", shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightcoral];cm_cost[label="Capacity Market Costs
(Blackout Prevention)", shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightcoral];renewables_obligation[label="Renewables Obligation
(Paying for Past Green Subsidies)", shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightgoldenrodyellow];feed_in_tariff[label="Feed-in Tariff
(Solar Panel Payments)", shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightgoldenrodyellow];cheap_electricity[label="Future Cheap Electricity: £50 / MWh", shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightseagreen];ditch_grid[label="Ditch the Power Grid
(Use Solar + Batteries)", shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightblue];grid_utilization[label="Better Grid Utilization
(Fill in the Rectangle)", shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightblue];main->wholesale_cost;main->network_cost;main->generation_cost;main->miscellaneous_cost;network_cost->rising_network_cost;rising_network_cost->cfd_cost;cfd_cost->cm_cost;network_cost->renewables_obligation;renewables_obligation->feed_in_tariff;cheap_electricity->ditch_grid;cheap_electricity->grid_utilization;}
